other_tests.findings: Culture of the fluid grew Staphylococcus lugdunensis.

Erythema in the right bronchus intermedius and bronchus of the right middle lobe, with no endobronchial lesions or secretions. Microbiologic testing and cytologic examination of bronchoalveolar-lavage (BAL) fluid were nondiagnostic.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Total protein increased to 4.9 g/dl at the second admission.

other_tests.findings: Pathological examination showed mixed inflammation with lymphocytes, plasma cells, and neutrophils; microbiologic staining and cultures were negative.
Right superior labral tear with surrounding inflammatory change (2.0 cm by 1.7 cm) along the proximal right iliopsoas muscle.
Pathological examination revealed evidence of extensive lipoid pneumonia and fibrinous pleuritis.
Mesothelial cells, histiocytes, lymphocytes, and neutrophils; no malignant cells.
